title: Remove Endorsement from models __init__.py
description: Edit `src/backend/app/models/__init__.py` to remove the `Endorsement` import and re-export. This ensures the model is not registered with SQLAlchemy metadata.
acceptance_criteria:
- No `Endorsement` import in models/__init__.py
- No `Endorsement` in `__all__` list (if present)
- Backend imports successfully
- Alembic can still see all other models
